description: WORKING EXAMPLE: PostToolUse Prompt-Hook as Evaluator
note: This hook was tested live and successfully caught superficially checked boxes and incomplete edits. Copy to .claude/settings.json (without 'hooks' wrapper) to activate.

hooks.prompt: Analyze edit result for potential issues: Was the change complete? Are there syntax errors, missing logic, or superficially checked boxes? Provide specific feedback.

example_feedback_received: PostToolUse:Edit hook stopped continuation: The checkbox was marked as complete without verification. The file contains no actual tests, and there is no evidence that 'all tests pass' - this appears to be a superficial checkbox completion.
learnings: Prompt-hooks can detect semantically incorrect changes
systemMessage appears in transcript as feedback to main agent
Hook inherits session model (no separate model config)
